X vs X: Rock Paper Scissors | Play rock-paper-scissors. Winner is the winner. Play 4 games. If it's a tie both players lose
All Solo: Slap City | Everybody smacks a flat surface. Whoever had the loudest slap wins.
Solo: The Accountant | Open the phone's calculator. Enter "1 + 1" and then tap = as fast as you can. If you can hit 100 within 20 seconds you win. If you go over you lose.

X vs X: Phone Line | Two players hold a phone between them using their index finger and thumb. Which ever team is the last to be connected between the phones win.
All Solo: Spin to Win | Who ever phone is the last one spinning wins

X vs X: The Real Walter Nichols | Both players guess what the lowest temperature will be next week. Then check the weather app. Closest guess wins.
All Solo: Phone Curling | Slide the phone across the floor. Everyone else slide their phones and who ever is closes to the first slid phone wins.
Hot and Ready Memes Aplenty | Whichever player can show the spiciest meme is the winner.
